lines.text: Very good. But brick not hit back!
What's the hold-up?
He says Senzo Tanaka is his shidoshi.
What's the difference if Bruce Springsteen is his shidoshi?
If Senzo Tanaks is his shidoshi, then show us the Dim Mak.

[turns to Frank]
What the hell is a Dim Mack?
Death touch.
[first lines]
Jackson, you going to go to Hong Kong?
I love anything full contact. I need a few more scars on my face.
But I heard you can get killed at that Kumite.
Only if you fuck up.
Aren't you a little young for full-contact?
Aren't you a little old for videogames?
I ain't your pal, dickface.
You come upstairs with me for an interview.
Like hell, let go of me.
You want Hossein, no?
No, Hossein is an asshole.
WHAT DID YOU CALL ME?
Do you want me to spell it out for you?

[prevents Hossein from smacking Janice Kent]
Leave the girl alone.
He's the American shit head who makes tricks with bricks!
Guess the Kumite starts one day earlier this year, huh fellas?
Shingo and I were close friends. Brothers. And you and Mrs. Tanaka have treated me like a son. What will happen now?
No more training. Stop now.

[shakes his head]
But you have so much to teach.

You don't understand. During the war, I lost my first family. My son, daughter, and wife. I left Japan because of the war. War was wrong. I came to America to start over, to have a new family, and a son. For 2,000 the teachings passed, father to son, father to son. When Shingo died, it stopped.
Teach me. I can do it.
You are not Japanese! You are not a Tanaka!
You told me to use any tactic that works, never to commit yourself to one style, to keep an open mind!
Why?
To honor you, shidoshi.
Who the hell are these scumbags?
Stay out of this, pal.
I ain't your pal, dickface.
[Frank has just won his first fight in record time]
His first fight in the kumite and he broke the fucking world record!
So you stomped him real good, huh, Frankie?
Even worse.
What do you mean?
He made him say matte.
All right, Frankie! But you'd better watch out - you might have to face me next time!
You guys are out of your minds!
I'll drink to that!
Choose a brick. I know, bottom one, right?
[Jackson takes a deep breath and smashes the top brick. Dusting off the bottom one, he holds it up]
See? Not a scratch on it.

[chuckles]
Not Dim Mak.
Yeah? Well, neither is this.
[Jackson smashes the brick against his forehead]

[giving the pieces to the official]
For you.
Time to separate the men from the boys.
Just be sure Chong Li doesn't separate your head from your body.
You break my record, now I break you, like I break your friend.
I'm Lin. You Jackson? You look like a Jackson. That must make you Frank Ducks.
No, it's DUX.
Oh, right, like put up your dukes.
[Jackson is getting ready to fight Chong Li]
Go for the gut. He's soft there.
What the hell are you talking about?
Chong Li's weak in the gut. That's how Parades surprised him.
[nods curtly with a look of grim encouragement]
Hey. You listening to me? Go for the stomach. And stay away from his right leg.
Will you stop worrying, Frankie? I've got it under control. You sound like my mother. Man alive.

Now remember, it's full contact. There are three ways to win. One, You knock your opponent out. Two, the other guy quits, and shouts 'Matte.' It's like saying 'Uncle.' Three, You throw the fucker right off the runway!
Piece o' cake.
You cannot take Katana Sword by stealing, it is very special sword, you must earn it.
I wasn't going to steal it!

[slices off the front of Frank's hat]
You didn't Flinch! You have fighting spirit!
You not gonna call the cops?
MMM, Not if we make a deal.
What kind of a deal?
[Frank is doing splits between two chairs]
That hurts me just lookin' at it.
You are next!
Now I show you some trick or two!
